brands.name: Ippodo
brands.description: Very affordable online matcha brand. They used to be on Amazon but have now moved all their online operations to their own store.

brands.name: Marukyu Koyamaen
brands.description: A highly-ranked matcha brand, I really want to personally try this myself. I've had it at other stores before, but this brand sells out constantly due to their limited supply.

brands.name: kettl
brands.description: An NYC-based tea brand that sells other teas such as hojicha, genmaicha, and oolong. They're fairly expensive but have great teas in general.

brands.name: rocky's matcha
brands.description: An LA-based matcha brand with a wide variety of different types of matcha. Generally pretty well-liked online!

brands.name: matchaful
brands.description: A woman-owned matcha brand based in New York. Specializes primarily in matcha and the selections are picked by the founder herself.

brands.name: Chitchat LA
brands.description: An LA-based cafe that has a signature flagship ceremonial matcha.
